---
name: Venus_Scere_GRAStag
creator: keoni
description: Venus fluorescent protein codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae with GRAStag
prefix: A
suffix: GGAAGAGCACTT
sequence: 
---

Yellow fluorescent protein derived from Aequorea victoria GFP with improved brightness and reduced photobleaching, codon-optimized for S. cerevisiae. Exhibits bright yellow fluorescence with excitation/emission maxima at 515/528 nm.
